body.name: SIMPLIHOME Artisan Solid Pine Wood 54 inch Contemporary Sideboard Buffet Credenza in Dark Chestnut Brown features 2 Doors, 6 Drawers and 2 Cabinets with Large storage spaces
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 3 hrs 3 mins
features: Handcrafted with care using the finest quality solid wood
Hand-finished with a Dark Chestnut Brown stained and glazed finish with a protective NC lacquer to accentuate and highlight the grain and the uniqueness of each piece of furniture
Features four (4) central and two (2) side drawers with metal glides, and two (2) side doors that open to large storage spaces with one (1) shelf each.
Style includes clean angle edged table top with distinctive contemporary look, mullion framed tempered glass doors, and square, slightly tapered legs
Includes rectangular Antique Bronze knobs; Size: 17" d x 54" w x 36" h
body.description: The solid wood Artisan Sideboard Buffet has plenty of storage and space for all your dining and entertaining needs. It has six drawers and two large side storage cabinets that open to one adjustable shelf each.; Efforts are made to reproduce accurate colors, variations in color may occur due to computer monitor and photography; At Simpli Home we believe in creating excellent, high quality products made from the finest materials at an affordable price. Every one of our products come with a 1-year warranty and easy returns if you are not satisfied.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The solid wood Artisan Sideboard Buffet has plenty of storage and space for all your dining and entertaining needs. It has six drawers and two large side storage cabinets that open to one adjustable shelf each.
Features four central and two side drawers with metal glides, and two side doors that open to large storage spaces with one shelf each.
Hand-finished with a Dark Chestnut Brown stained and glazed finish with a protective NC lacquer to accentuate and highlight the grain and the uniqueness of each piece of furniture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Follow Instructions Carefully
reviews.reviewText: This is a fabulous piece of furniture. Real wood, not pressboard. It takes a long time to put it together but do take your time so you don't have to redo anything. Be careful, the wood is quite soft so it's easy to strip the wood if you use a power drill for the screws. You do need to use a drill, just don't go too fast with it, and don't tighten the screws with the drill -- tighten them with a screwdriver. It looks fabulous and fits exactly where I wanted it. Dust with only a microfiber cloth, dampened if necessary. DO NOT USE SPRAY FURNITURE POLISH OR RISK LOSING THE BEAUTIFUL SHINY PLOLISH. Very happy with this unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the price a lot of damage.
reviews.reviewText: A lot of damage probably the way they handling it. The wood are very sturdy we love the product but when we assemble it my husband saw a lot of damage. And it’s not easy to return and replace a new one because it’s very heavy. Unless they will send us a new one. That is fair enough for the worth 600+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, takes forever to assemble
reviews.reviewText: It looks amazing and is extremely sturdy, but this thing took forever to put together. I'm talking well over four hours including snack breaks!! I assembled it alone and no individual step was difficult, but it was hands down the most involved and time consuming assembly of any piece of furniture I have ever purchased. I really think that it is a matter of the manufacturer designing a product to be quality and sturdy over having it be easy to put together.The instructions were very clear. All pieces came nicely labeled. They put arrows pointing toward the front for all pieces where you had to decide how to orient them. They even included drill holes at the top and bottom of the doors so that it doesn't matter which door you put on the left and which one you put on the right. Either way you can put the magnet at the bottom to connect to the magnet on the bottom of the inside to hold it closed.Without the drawers in it or doors on it, it was light enough for me, a relative weakling, to pick up on my own and move to its final spot. The only time that an extra pair of hands would have been nice was when having to support the doors to connect the hinges to the main body of the sideboard.Again, every individual step is easy enough, but people who just have average modular furniture assembly skills could find this to be a really daunting. Overall, I'm relieved to be done and extremely satisfied with the final product. Extremely well designed. Would buy another piece of furniture from this manufacturer without hesitation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Arrived VERY damaged
reviews.reviewText: This buffet IS beautiful, but at this time I cannot give it a good rating. Multiple pieces arrived damaged, including one of the preassembled tracks for the drawers, which was bent outward, leaving me unable to insert a drawer in one spot. Additionally, there is visible damage on the top, on of the drawers, and the bottom piece which is really the foundation for the entire cabinet has a huge crack in two places.I contacted the company for replacement parts, and was told they were on back order. My options were to refund/return, keep as is with a partial refund, or wait 3 - 4 months for parts. I'm taking a gamble and waiting the 3 - 4 months for the back ordered parts in hopes that they arrive undamaged, and if I'm easily able to replace everything I will come back and update my review. For as much as this item costs, I should not have to go through this trouble. The fact that this was a gift for our daughter added insult to injury.SimpliHome does not seem to place a lot of value in quality control. Customers should NOT have to go through this hassle.4/5/22 UPDATE: SimpliHome has reached out to say that they have not yet received the back ordered parts, and wants to send me $85 as a 'discount' ... I don't think they understand that I spent more than $600 for a piece of furniture that is going to fall apart as soon as we start to use it because of the damages to the foundation of the cabinet, and an empty hole where a drawer should be because the track is bent. For that kind of money, this item should be in perfect condition, and this offer is unacceptable. I see others here who received this buffet in perfect (or near perfect) condition. SimpliHome can make this right by 1.) finding my replacement parts or 2.) send me a new cabinet or 3.) refund my purchase. I will follow up once I know what their decision is. In the meantime, THANKS SimpliHome for turning what should have been an awesome gift for my daughter into an expensive nightmare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well made sideboard with 6 drawers and 2 glass doors. The assembly takes time with extra fasteners supplied. Easy instructions with what fasteners to use. Good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to make dents and very fragile

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars beautiful piece of furniture
reviews.reviewText: Once we were able to get it put together correctly, it is beautiful. We had the same issue that another buyer did where the doors stuck out at the top. My husband is very handy and knew that he followed the instructions perfectly. We ended up taking the top off and were able to get the upright boards to slip into place which fixed the problem. I am using it as a coffee bar and it holds everything we need plus more. Great storage and very solid piece of furniture. I love it.
